Text: DjDEV, is there any way to thank you anyhow for the great classics you share? You are awesome, thank you so much for this incredible strategy game. Cheers :)
no problem plenty more games to come

The crack inside is not for the 2.5 patch but for version 1 (both in the crack directory and in the image). 
However patches and cracks from version 2. to 2.3 can be found in gamecopyworld. Between 2.3 and 2.5 there are so few bug changes so that's no big deal. That's the best strategy game for WWII pacific, thanks a lot again :)
